page.syntax: V UI_DLG_REFRESH_TARGETED(C title,C vars,[C ommit[,L asynchronous]])

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

argument.name: vars
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of controls to refresh.

argument.name: ommit
argument.description: Optional. A list of controls not to refresh.

page.description: Refresh a dialogs controls that match vars - ommit the control def.
page.discussion: The UI_DLG_REFRESH_TARGETED() function refreshes a selected list of controls on a Xdialog form. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.description: The following example refreshes only the fn and fb controls on an Xdialog.
section.example: dim clst as C clst = <<%str% fn fb %str% ui_dlg_refresh_targeted("Confirm Replace", clst)
